entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as having black eyes fixed upon Narcissa's tear-filled blue ones. He is also mentioned to be kneeling opposite Narcissa and grasping her hand.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is described as having her mouth fall open in astonishment when Snape suggests she become the Bonder. She is also mentioned to be drawing her wand and stepping forwards to place it on their linked hands.

entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is described as having tear-filled blue eyes and clutching Snape's hand. She is also mentioned to be consenting to have the Unbreakable Vow made.

relationships.description: Snape and Narcissa are described as kneeling opposite each other.
Bellatrix and Snape are described as grasping right hands.
Bellatrix and Narcissa are described as having their linked hands placed under Bellatrix's wand.
